attributes.title: if i could give a lower star review i would 💔💔💔
attributes.review: ugly ugly ugly 💔💔💔i downloaded this app because i love father donald and want to see him succeed in all aspects 💔💔💔 but this app is terrible 💔💔💔 i feel that a better alternative to this app is tiktok, as i always know the dates of his rallies from tiktok 🥰🥰🥰 ans always remember to reserve a seat, even if i am unable to attend 🥰🥰🥰

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review: DISGUSTING🤢i opened up the app and i was horrified. i saw a rapist and a racist all in one. 0/10 would not recommend. i’d rather kill myself then open up this app again.

attributes.title: very traumatic
attributes.review: i couldn’t believe that people would let an app like this work. it is absolutely terrible. there is so much nudity and cussing. i can’t even be around anyone with this app it’s so horrifying. i’ve had terrible nightmares and i haven’t been able to sleep since i got the app. please get rid of it

attributes.title: Horrifying🤢🤮
attributes.review: I opened the app only for a puff a Cheeto dust to blow in my face!😰 Not only is it imposible to get off, but now I’m also blind.🤕🤒 Totally disgusted that our one and only Trumpet would do this to me!!!!🤡

attributes.title: Glitchy and runs VERY slow
attributes.review: Every time I use the app it is as if it is running on a potato. It’s not worth downloading AT ALL. It’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: I hate this!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! The first thing I saw when I opened the app was a cheetoh working out naked! Very immature and there was much more that shocked me! This app is terrible! 😳😡🤢

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible🤮 my eyesight was fine whenever I first got the app but once I opened it and saw a horrible picture of a orange Cheeto I started to go blind👩🏽‍🦯

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: Worst app ever!!!! The guy in it is the guy that me and my brother saw one time and he called us fat ugly and poor and then shot us in the head and left laughing

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: this app made me vomit right when i opened it up. then a dinosaur came out of it and stole my mom. said that it’ll haunt me in my dreams. then yesterday when i opened up the app again i literally had a night terror of trump coming outside of the app and stealing my mom. help i think my mom is missing and i think the dinosaur or trump stole it.

attributes.title: daddy trump 😍😩🍊🥕
attributes.review: I went online to see trump daddy and i was shocked to see that there were pictures of NAKED ORANGE CARROTS on it. disgusting. i hate this app and i might bleach my intestines just in case i see it again 🥝🥚🍍🍅🥚🍍🧈🥑🥔🍗🥦🌽🥨🥑🥔🍖
